      • checkClassTimeTableClash

        public boolean checkClassTimeTableClash(java.lang.String userID,
                                        java.lang.String courseID,
                                        java.lang.String sectionID)
        Check for Class Timetable Clash
        Parameters:
        userID - the userID
        courseID - the courseID
        sectionID - the sectionID
        Returns:
        true if there is a timetable clash in the student enrolled course or when there is a timetable lash in the bid table

      • clashWithEnrolledSection

        public boolean clashWithEnrolledSection(java.lang.String userID,
                                        java.lang.String courseID,
                                        java.lang.String sectionID)
        Check if section clash with student enrolled section
        Parameters:
        userID - the userID
        courseID - the courseID
        sectionID - the sectionID
        Returns:
        true Condition 1: when the current courseID equal to the student enrolled section courseID and current sectionID equal to the student enrolled sectionID. Condition 2: when the current courseID is not equal to the student enrolled section courseID and the current day of the section is equal to the student enrolled Day and if the startTime and endTime matches

      • checkExamTimeTableClash

        public boolean checkExamTimeTableClash(java.lang.String userID,
                                       java.lang.String courseID,
                                       java.lang.String sectionID)
        Check for Exam Timetable clash
        Parameters:
        userID - the userID
        courseID - the courseID
        sectionID - the sectionID
        Returns:
        true if there is a exam timetable clash in the student enrolled course or when there is a exam timetable lash in the bid table

      • clashWithEnrolledCourse

        public boolean clashWithEnrolledCourse(java.lang.String userID,
                                       java.lang.String courseID,
                                       java.lang.String sectionID)
        Check if the course and section clash with student enrolled section and course
        Parameters:
        userID - the userID
        courseID - the courseID
        sectionID - the sectionID
        Returns:
        true Condition 1: when the current courseID equal to the student enrolled section courseID and current sectionID equal to the student enrolled sectionID. Condition 2: when the current courseID is not equal to the student enrolled section courseID and the current day of the section is equal to the student enrolled Day and if the startTime and endTime matches

        Returns:

        courseID - the courseID
        Returns:
